landing.title: Levelly
landing.subtitle: Create leveling quizzes with AI-powered grading. Assess students and redirect them based on their level.

login.title: Welcome back
login.description: Sign in to your teacher account
login.consent: I consent to the collection and processing of my personal data (including email, name, and usage information) to provide and improve this service.

signup.title: Create an account
signup.description: Sign up to start creating quizzes
signup.name: Name
signup.consent: I consent to the collection and processing of my personal data (including email, name, and usage information) to provide and improve this service.

dashboard.title: Your Quizzes
dashboard.subtitle: Create and manage your leveling quizzes
dashboard.empty: You haven't created any quizzes yet.

newQuiz.title: Create New Quiz
newQuiz.description: Give your quiz a name and description, then add questions.

assignment.deleteConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete "{title}" and all associated questions, sessions, share links, and student submissions. This action cannot be undone.

sections.sessionsDescription: Organize questions into sequential sessions for multi-step quizzes
sections.questionsDescription: Add MCQ, open-ended, slider, or image map questions by session
sections.levelRedirectsDescription: Configure where to redirect students based on their level
sections.feedbackSettingsDescription: Control what information students see after completing the quiz
sections.shareLinksDescription: Generate links for students to access this quiz

assignment.addQuestionFirst: Add at least one question before publishing.

questions.createDescription: Create a multiple choice or open-ended question
questions.question: Question
questions.notAutoGraded: This question won't be auto-graded or count toward the score.
questions.surveyNote: Turn off to create a survey-style question.
questions.allowMultiple: Allow multiple correct answers (students must select all)
questions.selectCorrectAnswer: Select the radio button next to the correct answer
questions.noCorrectStored: No correct answer will be stored for this question.
questions.atLeastTwoCorrect: Please select at least 2 correct answers for multiple-answer questions
questions.rubricPlaceholder: e.g., Must mention X, Y, Z concepts...
questions.openNotGraded: This open-ended question won't be auto-graded.
questions.toleranceNote: Answer is correct if within +/- this value
questions.sliderNotGraded: Correct value is not required for ungraded slider questions.
questions.maxGreaterThanMin: Maximum value must be greater than minimum value
questions.correctBetweenMinMax: Correct value must be between min and max
questions.correctWithinRange: Correct value must be within slider range.
questions.imageMapNote: Image Map questions require a dedicated editor. After creating the question, you'll be able to upload an image and place interactive flags on it.
questions.imageHelp: Add an image to help illustrate the question
questions.editDescription: Update content and session placement for this question.
questions.noQuestionsInSession: No questions in this session yet.
questions.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this question?

sessions.descriptionPlaceholder: Shown to students before the session
sessions.noSessions: No sessions yet. Create your first session above.
sessions.deleteConfirm: Delete this session? Questions will be unassigned.
sessions.title: Title

shareLinks.publishFirst: Publish the quiz to generate share links.

feedback.controlInfo: Control what information students can see after completing the quiz.
feedback.showCorrectAnswersDesc: Students will see the correct answer for each question
feedback.showAiFeedbackDesc: Students will see AI-generated feedback for open-ended questions

redirects.info: Configure what students see based on their level. You can either redirect them to an external link or show them embedded content (like H5P interactive modules).
redirects.embedHelp: Paste the full embed code including iframe and script tags. Students will see this content after viewing their results.

submissions.title: Student Submissions
submissions.submittedResponsesDesc: View all student submissions and their answers
submissions.inProgressDesc: Students who started but haven't submitted yet
submissions.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {count} submission(s)? This action cannot be undone.
submissions.regradeConfirm: Are you sure you want to regrade {count} submission(s)? This will replace all existing grades and AI feedback.
submissions.singleDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this submission? This action cannot be undone and all answers will be permanently removed.
submissions.singleRegradeConfirm: Are you sure you want to regrade this submission? This will replace all existing grades and AI feedback. The grading process may take a moment.

quiz.notAvailable: This quiz is not currently available.
quiz.journeyCompleteDesc: You have already finished this journey.
quiz.consent: I consent to the collection and processing of my data (including name, email, and quiz answers) for the purpose of this assessment.
quiz.noQuestions: No questions available for this session.
quiz.dragSlider: Drag the slider to select your answer
quiz.imageMapMissing: Error: Image map configuration is missing
quiz.clickFlags: Click on the flags to answer

results.title: {quizTitle} Results
results.aiGrading: AI is grading your open-ended answers...

embed.title: Learning Content for {level} Level
embed.returnNote: You can return to results at any time.

sessionMap.title: Session Overview
sessionMap.description: You will complete the sessions in order. This map is for reference only.
